channel.title: Geek News Central Audio
channel.description: Talking tech for the common man. With a twice weekly tech show covering a wide range of technical issues. A Top Tech Podcasts and home of the Author of Podcasting The Do it Yourself Guide Visit Geek News Central at geeknewscentral.com
channel.itunes:summary: This technology show hosted by Todd Cochrane a Pioneer in the Podcasting space, focuses on technology, science and New Media. Tech News for the common man, join his 175,000+ family of satisfied listeners viewers. Every show is a learning experience covering all things tech so you do not have to. One of the first 100 podcasters his show is a must listen. Author of the first book on podcasting and the CEO behind RawVoice the New Media company representing 6200 new media creators!
channel.itunes:author: Todd Cochrane
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tech, Science, New Media and more from a Pioneer in Podcasting
channel.itunes:keywords: geek news, todd cochrane, technology, podcast book, podcasting, science technical, tech podcast, windows, podcast news, windows, mac

item.title: GNC-2012-05-29 #769 Family Loss
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: Received the news late this afternoon that my Grandfather on my dads side of the family had passed away. While expected still has hit me like a ton of bricks. I am luckier than most as I had all of my grandparents up to a few short years ago. All lived into their 90′s and [...]
item.content:encoded:
Received the news late this afternoon that my Grandfather on my dads side of the family had passed away. While expected still has hit me like a ton of bricks. I am luckier than most as I had all of my grandparents up to a few short years ago. All lived into their 90′s and went out on their own terms which is all one can hope for at the end of a long fruitful life. On my past show we where close to the end as my Grandfather was reaching up and calling out my Dad’s name. So I know that my Dad was waiting for him and that he is in a better place. I will likely be heading to Michigan either Wednesday to Thursday so if there is a show it will be from Michigan..

Congratulations to Melisa Strayer she is out last listener appreciation month winner. Congrats to all of the winners this month, and a big thank you to all of you that participated in the contests.

Sponsored by:

"$1.99/mo economy hosting for 3 months Promo Code 199geek
GNC GoDaddy Promo Code save you money See Full List Here!

item.title: GNC-2012-05-24 #768 Bandwidth Running on Empty
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: The past show winner declined a second prize so I have re-awarded the prize to Jerry Mcfalls with tonight’s prize going to Tom with the Comcast address. Wining is easy just sign up for the shows newsletter.. May is listener appreciation month and we are giving prizes away every show. Tonight I am pretty pleased with [...]
item.content:encoded:
The past show winner declined a second prize so I have re-awarded the prize to Jerry Mcfalls with tonight’s prize going to Tom with the Comcast address. Wining is easy just sign up for the shows newsletter.. May is listener appreciation month and we are giving prizes away every show. Tonight I am pretty pleased with the road show.. All we need to do is get the green screen to be all dialed in.

There is a family development. My Grandfather on my Dad’s side is very ill and I will let you know if there are any developments or if I have to make a mad dash to Michigan.

item.title: GNC-2012-05-21 #767 HD Mobile Broadcast Studio
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: Congrats to Sonya Jensen for winning a iPod Nano I think lightning has struck twice here as it appears a husband and wife may have won the last two contests either that or it is a heck of a coincidence. .. Tonight you can win by simply reviewing and commenting of the video of the [...]
item.content:encoded:
Congrats to Sonya Jensen for winning a iPod Nano I think lightning has struck twice here as it appears a husband and wife may have won the last two contests either that or it is a heck of a coincidence. .. Tonight you can win by simply reviewing and commenting of the video of the show. I think it will take a show or two to get things dialed in here on the new portable studio but things went better than I could have imagined.

item.title: GNC-2012-05-14 #765 Final Checkout is Complete
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: Congrats to Michael and his winning of a iPod Nano.. Listed to win in contest #5.. We had a great mothers day weekend with a stay cation where we stayed in Waikiki for a night. Hung out at the p0ol and just relaxed. Sunday afternoon while my wife relaxed. I did a final checkout of [...]
item.content:encoded:
Congrats to Michael and his winning of a iPod Nano..  Listed to win in contest #5..  We had a great mothers day weekend with a stay cation where we stayed in Waikiki for a night. Hung out at the p0ol and just relaxed. Sunday afternoon while my wife relaxed. I did a final checkout of the HD Mobile Broadcast Studio and got it ready for my trip to Washington DC next week where I will put it through it’s paces. The portable green screen has not arrived yet so we will be playing that one by ear.

In this show I have a great variety of tech news and information to share with your enjoy the show and be sure to listen to win.

Sponsored by:

item.title: GNC-2012-05-11 #764 Team Ohana
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: Congrats to Sam our winner in today’s show. Programming note I have a something to share with a zealous fan at the end of the show tonight, first time in the history of the show to have to do so. But it was bound to happen at some point. I have this show jam packed [...]
item.content:encoded:
Congrats to Sam our winner in today’s show. Programming note I have a something to share with a zealous fan at the end of the show tonight, first time in the history of the show to have to do so. But it was bound to happen at some point. I have this show jam packed with tech.

Once in a while a show just hits on all cylinders and I think this one did tonight it was my pleasure to bring you lots of tech plus I get to rant on a Wall Street Fat Cat. I will be hosting a Google On Air with Saturday Morning Tech so I hope you will join us on air.

item.title: GNC-2012-05-08 #763 Show Notes are Back!
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: As you can see there is a link below that has a no-follow tag on it that takes you to the new show notes page. I explain in the show tonight the reason for the change. There may yet be a software solution here at GNC. But we have to do some more investigating on [...]
item.content:encoded:
As you can see there is a link below that has a no-follow tag on it that takes you to the new show notes page. I explain in the show tonight the reason for the change. There may yet be a software solution here at GNC. But we have to do some more investigating on how to implement it. But one thing I am pretty sure of the list of links to all of the articles I cover are forever gone from within the show notes blog post.

Tonight I take you on a tech journey that covers a wide range of topics including some cool stuff happening here at Geek News Central. I want you to pull up a chair or watch the show from your lazy boy as I break down the latest tech news. You have a great chance to win a cool prize in today’s show so listen to win.

item.title: GNC-2012-05-04 #762 Google Punishment Requires Change!
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: Sadly after 762 episodes the way I do my show notes has to change. As near as we can figure it, with recent changes to the Google search results, it appear Google is punishing my site due to the way I put show notes in the shows blog post. After all it’s just a computer [...]
item.content:encoded:
Sadly after 762 episodes the way I do my show notes has to change. As near as we can figure it, with recent changes to the Google search results, it appear Google is punishing my site due to the way I put show notes in the shows blog post.  After all it’s just a computer indexing a page, and the computer has no way of understanding that the reason for the high number of links is due to the corresponding audio and video coverage. I have seen enough of a reduction of traffic that it concerns me to make a major change.  I have a plan ahead, and will be implementing the changes as fast as I can get it implemented. For the next couple of shows though their will be no detailed show notes, until I have the new system in place.

There seems to be no other reasonable explanation for Google’s actions, as all of the content on GNC is original content with legitimate outbound links and we have no warnings in the Google Webmaster site. The format of the show notes was such that the links had little context, with link after link stacked on top of one another. We think Google flagged those posts as adding little value and penalized us for it. I know that 10′s of thousands of you come to this page and follow the links along in the show. After 7+ years of doing the show notes the same way it really pains me to have to do this.

The podcast is only a portion of this sites overall traffic and our traffic has been growing steadily over the past few years to force me to make the change.

You have a great chance to win a cool prize in today’s show so listen to win.

Sponsored by:

"$1.99/mo economy hosting for 3 months Promo Code 199geek
GNC GoDaddy Promo Code save you money See Full List Here!

Download the Audio Show File

Follow me on Google+
Follow @geeknews on Twitter
Geek News Central Facebook Page
Show Hotline 24/7 1-619-342-7365 or e-mail geeknews@gmail.com

item.title: GNC-2012-05-01 #761 Listener Appreciation Month
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: May will be the month of giveaways, listen to win. I also go into some of things that I have been doing which you are probably already aware to ensure the stability of the show for the long hall. Extended dialogue time on this show but with a hard hitting tech show as well. Download [...]
item.content:encoded:
May will be the month of giveaways, listen to win. I also go into some of things that I have been doing which you are probably already aware to ensure the stability of the show for the long hall. Extended dialogue time on this show but with a hard hitting tech show as well.

Sponsored by:

"$1.99/mo economy hosting for 3 months Promo Code 199geek
GNC GoDaddy Promo Code save you money See Full List Here!

Download the Audio Show File

Show Notes:
Wind Generators and Global Warming?
Can’t trust the Tech Blogs!
Copyright is broke really bad.
Copyfraud and Trolls.
More Copyright Stupidity.
Harvard Battles Journal Costs.
Facebook likes not Protected Free Speech.
McCarthy is back at FBI!
Dotcom gets a bunch of his Money back.
Pirate Bay censored in U.K.
Hulu to require cable?
Backdoors Everywhere.
SETI to help Air Force?
Soyuz lands!
100 days to Mars Landing.
Time running out for Moores Law?
SiriusXM App Update not so good!
Microsoft dumps 300 million into Nook.
Fair Use is dead.
Digg to Washington Post?
Harley makes it from Japan.
Mirrorcase Kickstarter.
Paul Miller leaves the Net!
SpaceX test fire on pad?
Triggertrap.
Dish Hopper up to 6 channel record DVR.
Internet Speed down overall.
Bluetooth everywhere.
Skype Update on iOS.
www Turns 19.
Cloud Storage chart.
item.itunes:subtitle: May will be the month of giveaways, listen to win. I also go into some of things that I have been doing which you are probably already aware to ensure the stability of the show for the long hall. Extended dialogue time on this show but with a hard hitt...
item.itunes:summary:
May will be the month of giveaways, listen to win. I also go into some of things that I have been doing which you are probably already aware to ensure the stability of the show for the long hall. Extended dialogue time on this show but with a hard hitting tech show as well.
Download the Audio Show File
Show Notes: Wind Generators and Global Warming? Can't trust the Tech Blogs! Copyright is broke really bad. Copyfraud and Trolls. More Copyright Stupidity. Harvard Battles Journal Costs. Facebook likes not Protected Free Speech. McCarthy is back at FBI! Dotcom gets a bunch of his Money back. Pirate Bay censored in U.K. Hulu to require cable? Backdoors Everywhere. SETI to help Air Force? Soyuz lands! 100 days to Mars Landing. Time running out for Moores Law? SiriusXM App Update not so good! Microsoft dumps 300 million into Nook. Fair Use is dead. Digg to Washington Post? Harley makes it from Japan. Mirrorcase Kickstarter. Paul Miller leaves the Net! SpaceX test fire on pad? Triggertrap. Dish Hopper up to 6 channel record DVR. Internet Speed down overall. Bluetooth everywhere. Skype Update on iOS. www Turns 19. Cloud Storage chart.
item.itunes:author: Todd Cochrane
